title: Mobile Augmented Reality-Based English Vocabulary Instructional Design for Low-Achieving Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English vocabulary comprehension and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening MAR (Multimedia-Assisted Reading) content design competencies for pre-service/in-service teachers targeting low-achieving students (LINUS).

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more English vocabulary learning scenarios using MAR technology.
Learners can apply assessment tools to measure vocabulary acquisition effects for low-achieving students.
Learners can explain the MAR learning material development process based on the ADDIE model.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
